ing: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle root beer
1 (4 fluid ounce) bottle liquid smoke flavoring
n: Slow Cooker Root Beer Pulled Pork
des: "This simple slow cooker pulled pork recipe is big hit with my family of picky eaters. For a spicy kick, mix 1 part Frank'sÂ® RedHotÂ® Buffalo sauce and 1 part of your favorite mustard-based BBQ sauce. You can use a pork loin instead of pork shoulder, if desired. Combine with your favorite BBQ sauce and enjoy."
ins:
Place pork roast in a slow cooker and pour root beer, liquid smoke, and garlic over the top.
Cook on Low for 8 to 10 hours. Remove pork to a bowl. Strain liquid through a fine-mesh strainer, discard liquid, and add garlic to to pork. Shred pork using two forks.
